title: Bacopa Enlighten | Advanced Orthomolecular Research | AOR
description: AOR's Bacopa Enlighten has been shown in clinical studies to help support memory, manage the effects of stress on the brain and aid clear thinking.
cleaned_text: Supports antioxidant production in the brain - Supports memory and other cognitive functions Product Information Bacopa Enlighten for centuries to support proper function of the brain. The extract has been shown to offer support by the body somewhat protects them from factors which can invade other body cells, this separation leaves them vulnerable to the buildup of the body's ability to manage the effects of stress on and promote clear thinking. Ideal for those concerned of cognitive function.* AOR guarantees that all ingredients have been declared on the label. Made without wheat, gluten, corn, nuts, peanuts, sesame seeds, sulphites, mustard, soy, dairy, eggs, fish, shellfish or any animal by-product. Take one capsule daily with or without food, or as directed by a qualified health care practitioner. Do not use if pregnant or breastfeeding. Consult a health care practitioner for use beyond three months. May cause nausea, dry mouth and fatigue. Do not crush, blend or mix the capsules. Swallow the capsule whole. Keep out of reach of children. *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose,
